zowe.commands.alwaysEdit.description: Allow editing of commands before submitting

scripts.build: pnpm clean:bundle && pnpm license && webpack --mode development && pnpm madge
scripts.vscode:prepublish: pnpm clean:bundle && pnpm generateLocalization && webpack --mode production --devtool hidden-source-map
scripts.lint: pnpm lint:src && pnpm lint:tests && pnpm lint:pretty && pnpm markdown
